attributes.action: consider introducing legislation to prevent the sales of Christmas orientated goods until the 1st November at the earliest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Christmas comes but once a year, or at least it is meant to. 
The shops seem to want Christmas earlier and earlier every year, I am writing this on the 7th September 2007 and have already seen Advent calendars, Chrismas cakes and Christmas puddings on the shelves of my local superstore.

This is rediculous and is totally unnecessary and must place an intolerable strain on parents of young children with 'pester power' and 'is it Christmas yet' for the best part of 3 months.

I'm not a killjoy, but lets get a sense of reality again can we please, the 1st November is early enough to start thinking of Christmas.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
